# NSURLRequest.Attribution

**Enumeration**

The entities that can make a network request.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Attribution
```

## Overview

Use one of these values when setting the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLRequest/attribution-swift.property] parameter of a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLRequest]. If you don’t set a value, the system assumes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/Attribution-swift.enum/developer].

## Request sources

- **NSURLRequest.Attribution.developer**: A developer-initiated network request.
- **NSURLRequest.Attribution.user**: The user explicitly directs the app to make a network request.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Indicating the source of the request

- **attribution**: The entity that initiates the network request.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
